short_summary: Technical Service Support Ottawa-Gatineau is looking for a service provider to supply and install a wheel alignment equipment for their workshop located at 2380 Lancaster Road.
description: Technical Service Support Ottawa-Gatineau (TSS O-G) is mandated to provide maintenance services to all Department of National Defence (DND) vehicles in the National Capital Region (NCR). This fleet is composed of approximately 700 vehicles of all types and sizes. The TSS O-G workshop, which is located at 2380 Lancaster Road, is not currently equipped to do wheel alignments on any type of vehicles. To better serve its clients, TSS O-G has a requirement for the provision of wheel alignment equipment that is capable of accommodating vehicles with a wheel rim size between 12 inches and 24 inches in diameter.
full_summary:
### Vehicle Wheel Alignment Equipment

#### Reference Number and Solicitation Number

* cb-6577-11802397
* W6369-23-X047

#### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the provision of wheel alignment equipment that can accommodate a range of vehicle sizes, including those with wheel rims between 12 inches and 24 inches in diameter.

#### Description

Technical Service Support Ottawa-Gatineau (TSS O-G) provides maintenance services to approximately 700 DND vehicles in the National Capital Region (NCR). Currently, the TSS O-G workshop is not equipped to perform wheel alignments on all types of vehicles. To improve service offerings, TSS O-G requires equipment that can perform wheel alignments on vehicles with varying wheel sizes.

#### Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

#### Proposal Submission

 Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the Request for Proposal document.

#### Tender Contact Information

* Name: Evan MacGowan
* Email: [evan.macgowan2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:evan.macgowan2@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 408-8346
* Address:
	+ 101 Colonel By Drive
	+ Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
	+ Canada

#### Notice and Attachments

The Notice of Proposed Procurement and supporting documentation, including the Request for Proposal document, are available on the Canada Buy Services website. [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
